story-moment.AVENGERS' ATTACK: During the Avengers’ attack on Baron von Strucker’s Hydra base, the Scarlet Witch used her abilities on Tony Stark.
story-moment.DEATH OF PIETRO: After her brother Pietro was killed battling Ultron, Wanda took her revenge, tearing Ultron’s robotic heart from his body.
story-moment.BATTLE WITH CROSSBONES: In Lagos, the Scarlet Witch was horrified when she inadvertently caused the deaths of innocents while battling Crossbones.
story-moment.TEAM CAPTAIN AMERICA: Scarlet Witch was a hugely effective component for Captain America’s rogue team as they battled Iron Man and those who stood with him, notably not holding back while others did against their friends.
story-moment.DESTROYING THE MIND STONE: During the battle in Wakanda to stop Thanos and his forces, Wanda was forced to destroy Vision’s Mind Stone to keep it from Thanos, using her powers to simultaneously hold the Titan back.

powers+abilities.MENTAL MANIPULATION: The Scarlet Witch’s many abilities include a form of telepathy that includes mental manipulation – she has been able to put her foes into nightmare-type visions of their past or potential future.
powers+abilities.TELEKINESIS: The Scarlet Witch is a powerful telekinetic, able to lift and throw objects as large as a car or even other humans with her mind.
powers+abilities.LEVITATION: The Scarlet Witch’s telekinesis can be used to allow her to levitate herself.
powers+abilities.ENERGY BLASTS: The red energy present when Maximoff uses her abilities can itself be harnessed into energy blasts.
